Router Reset Required

The router appears to have a custom configuration. For automated onboarding, the router must be in factory default state.

  • Power off your OpenWrt router completely
  • Locate the reset button (usually a small recessed button)
  • While holding the reset button, power on the router
  • Continue holding the reset button for 10-15 seconds
  • Release the reset button and wait for the router to fully boot (2-3 minutes)
  • Ensure your computer is connected to the router's network
  • Click "Retry After Reset" below to restart the onboarding process
